name: Alliteration Locator
tagline: Detects alliterations by using orthographic cues
body:
### Welcome to Alliteration Locator
Alliteration Locator was built as a simple baseline for detecting alliterations. Although it bases it's decisions on orthographics rather than on pronunciation, it is very simple code.

Download source code at [https://github.com/bean5/AlliterationLocator
/zipball/master](https://github.com/bean5/AlliterationLocator
/zipball/master).

To download a compiled version, you can go to [http://students.cs.byu.edu/~bean5/ling-utils/AlliterationLocator/dist/alliterationFinder.jar](http://students.cs.byu.edu/~bean5/ling-utils/AlliterationLocator/dist/alliterationFinder.jar).

### About the code
This is done by using Java. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Got some some ideas for the project? Just leave feedback at [https://github.com/bean5/AlliterationLocator/issues/new](https://github.com/bean5/AlliterationLocator/issues/new)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
